#summary Key Components: Audio

[https://awe6.googlecode.com/svn/tags/api/types/awe6/interfaces/IAudioManager.html https://awe6.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/images/icons/audio.png]

Sounds and music over multiple channels are handled by the !AudioManager.  It provides a centralised manager to start, stop or transform audio.

== Things you should know about Audio ==

  * [https://code.google.com/p/awe6/source/browse/trunk/app/src/awe6/core/AudioManager.hx AudioManager] comes ready to run (it's automatically composed in [ComponentKernel Kernel]).
  * Any sound must be an [ComponentAssets Asset] referenced by unique key.
  * [https://code.google.com/p/awe6/source/browse/trunk/app/src/awe6/interfaces/EAudioChannel.hx AudioChannels] allow discrete control or transformation of multiple sounds.
  * Implements [https://awe6.googlecode.com/svn/tags/api/types/awe6/interfaces/IAudioManager.html IAudioManager].
  
== Did you know? ==

  * Using an `EAudioChannel.SUB_TYPE( this )` allows any other class easy access to it's own, unique, channel.
